AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.title: Ogryn Gun Lugger
AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] enjoys the act of firing [PAWN_possessive] weapon regardless of whether or not [PAWN_pronoun] is accurate. Instead [PAWN_nameDef] finds the enjoyment of the raw destructive power of [PAWN_possessive] weapon. Due to this fact [PAWN_nameDef] was given the biggest weapon to support [PAWN_possessive] squad.

+2 Shooting
-2 Melee
